name: Transamerica Pyramid
description: Tall, landmark building shaped like a narrow pyramid & housing a visitor center & a gift shop.

name: Space Needle
description: Iconic, 605-ft.-tall spire at the Seattle Center, with an observation deck & a rotating restaurant.

name: Calgary Tower
address: 101 9 Ave SW, Calgary, AB T2P 1J9, Canada
description: Curved, 630-ft.-tall monument celebrating US western expansion, with views from the top & a museum.

name: The Gateway Arch
description: Park honoring Jefferson's role in western expansion, featuring the Gateway Arch & visitors' center.

name: Wills Tower
description: Iconic, 110-story skyscraper featuring expansive views of Chicago from its 103rd-story Skydeck.

name: The Alamo
description: Small, shrinelike fortress & monument to Texas history with a museum, artifacts, gardens & more.

name: City Gallery in the Historic Water Tower
description: Chicago-focused gallery, specializing in photos, inside a 19th-century Gothic limestone landmark.

name: Toronto City Hall
address: 100 Queen St W, Toronto, ON M5H 2N2, Canada
description: Contemporary, iconic structure housing the mayor's office & offering tours.

name: The Metropolitan Museum of Art
description: A grand setting for one of the world's greatest collections of art, from ancient to contemporary.

name: Lincoln Memorial
address: 2 Lincoln Memorial Cir NW, Washington, DC 20037
description: Parthenon-inspired tribute to Abraham Lincoln with a 19-ft. marble statue, murals & reflecting pool.
